dmca.title: FanAxis no fan of copied text, images
dmca.body:
Demand Under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act 

(Second Notice)
 

To Whom it May Concern:

On 12/20/05, we noticed the following URL on your webhosting sites (http://www.blogspot.com) containing unattributed copy that infringes on
our exclusive copyrights. According to our records, we have not authorized
this use. 

Specifically, the following URLs contains images and text copied from our
web property at http://www.hanson.net, to which we hold exclusive
copyright:

http://glimm3ring.blogspot.com/ 
 
There are tons of links to the filesharing (that is going on) on the 1st link listed below. http://glimm3ring.blogspot.com/ 

If you look at the page you will see that there are TONS of links on the scoll menu on this website. But I will link a few for you! There are literally 93 different links to media of hanson (and thats just the first page!)

http://s53.yousendit.com/d.aspx?id=18H3S1Z5PTSB62KTV7AQGYQ3Q1

http://www.sendmefile.com/00173811

http://rapidshare.de/files/8680832/Patchogue_11.6.zip.html

http://www.sendmefile.com/00174509



Copyrighted music available for upload

Please note that we have never had any problem whatsoever with any other website in sending the DMCA via email with a signature.  Every website has responded and taken action and we have never been told to send documents via snail mail.  The digital signature has always been sufficient.  We have sent hundreds of similar DMCA notices to numerous websites with no need to send anything via regular mail.  This is the second notice that we have sent.  This is a legitimate DMCA legal notice.  
 
Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, this letter serves as
actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings. The
information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, I state that FanAxis is the owner of an exclusive right infringed
by the specified material. 

This user neither asked for nor received permission to use and sell our
content on your sites, therefore, we believe he or she has willfully
infringed our rights under 17 USC
